data.text: @Mirella_PhD I always wear my mask indoors supermarkets ect,, and will continue to do so.
@mountainash04 It sure is . . . BTW, I just calculated some very disturbing averages (posted a few mins ago)
@Curious39466224 Will post some totals as it may interest others
@Mirella_PhD Thanks for this! Can you include the total deaths for the year on the graph next time you update. Is very grim. Thanks again for all the work you do making this data accessible.
@Mirella_PhD Thanks for all this clearly formatted information Mirella. The deaths graph is a stark illustration of the high Covid toll this year.

@Mirella_PhD Amazing how the mood has changed about having such high Covid-19 cases!! I don;t care what others think and will continue to wear a mask!! 😷

Thanks again for the data!! 🙏💐💝
